!Detention Camp Warden: That's right. So we keep asking for help from the clan's adventurers... Of course, the high-ranked strategists, scholars and mystics are constantly looking for a more permanent solution. But with the fortresses in a state of constant strife, that doesn't seem likely any time soon. In the meantime, there's nothing else to do but keep suppressing the monsters the old-fashioned way.
